summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Board of Public Works to plank the roadway on East Sixty-fifth Street, between Latona Avenue and Eighth Avenue Northeast, Fourth Avenue Northeast, between Woodlawn Avenue and East Sixty-fifth Street; Fifth Avenue Northeast, between East Seventieth Street and East Seventy-first Street, and Weedin Place, between East Sixty-eighth Street and East Seventieth Street, all in the City of Seattle, and appropriating money therefor.
